channel.title: Improvise Life Show with Dr. Max
channel.description: With his unique approach featued on www.ImproviseLife.com Dr. Max presents surprising and unusual perspectives, talks to celebrities and helps you create solutions to relationship challenges of all kinds!

channel.itunes:author: Dr. Max Vogt
channel.itunes:summary: Dr. Max Improvise Life Show! Dr. Max presents a unique perspective on current events, "talks to" celebs, provides the most effective relationship help anywhere and entertains!
channel.itunes:subtitle: The Dr. Max Improvise Life Show!

item.title: Survive the Holidays... and Thrive
item.description: Dr. Max interviews DeeAnn Schmucker about her unique and very powerful ways (not "your mom's tips" or "Dr. Phil tips") to not only survive the holidays with family but actually truly enjoy them for once!
item.itunes:author: Dr. Max Vogt
item.itunes:summary: Dr. Max interviews DeeAnn Schmucker about her unique and very powerful ways (not "your mom's tips" or "Dr. Phil tips") to not only survive the holidays with family but actually truly enjoy them for once!

item.title: Impoverished Paula's Poverty... and Happiness
item.description:
A woman calling herself "Impoverished Paula" writes
Dr. Max… No matter how hard I work, I never seem to make enough money. What can I do to be happy in spite of poverty?
Dear Paula
I'm not sure what "enough money" is or "poverty" is for you in actual figures... but I can definitely tell you that you view yourself as poor. Here's the simple answer to your question. You can't be happy in spite of poverty!
Dr. Max continues...
www.ImproviseLife.com

item.title: Not Enough Sex? Red Flag
item.description:
Jim from Dallas writes, "My girlfriend doesn't want to have sex when I do... is this a red flag?
Dr. Max answers...

item.title: My Kids, His Kids... Different Rules? Parenting and Step-Par
item.description:
Elaine of Oklahoma City writes: Help, Dr. Max…. My husband & I disagree on how to parent our children (step and biological)… is it okay to have different sets of rule for different children?
Dr. Max answers.... The ImproviseLife Show with Dr. Max www.ImproviseLife.com
